The video was shared on social media pla: including Twitter and Facebook, by multiple users.
The video was uploaded on December 1: 2019, and has since been viewed over 1.2 million times and shared 38,000 times.
Through reverse image search: an article from a Pakistani news channel confirmed that the incident took place in Shakargarh district of Punjab in Pakistan, involving a woman named Amrat Bibi or Amrat Shahzadi, who was beaten up by lawyers during a verbal altercation at a local court hearing.
